title: Cassie Is Ready To Call Herself Out Over A Careless Comment She Made
description:
Last week Cassie made a comment on-air about people with an IQ below 85 being dumb, and one mom had something to say about it. Cassie is ready to call herself out and thank Bert Show Fam for broadening her horizons.
